message: Benefits of captioning your videos: indexing and searching, improving comprehension, compliance requirements, universal access
Legal requirements: Section 508 "equivalent alternatives for any multimedia"
Users have requirements too: enhanced captions, transcripts, described video
Right now the tools are rather laborious
Can outsource to companies: 3PlayMedia, Automatic Synch
Delivery methods: DVD or other fixed media, Web based delivery like YouTube
Not fully specced out yet, but <trac> element might be a child of <video>
